channel.title: System Design on norbix.dev - The log of my journey through code & software systems architecture
channel.description: Recent content in System Design on norbix.dev - The log of my journey through code & software systems architecture

item.title: Demystifying Big-O Notation in Software Engineering
item.description: Understand Big-O notation through real-world Go examples and discover how algorithmic complexity impacts code scalability, performance, and design choices.

item.title: Enterprise Integration Patterns in Go: Practical Examples
item.description: Explore key Enterprise Integration Patterns (EIP) with practical Go examples, covering point-to-point, pub/sub, queues, and event-driven design for distributed systems.

item.title: API-First Approach: Design Before You Code
item.description: Explore the API-first approach: why defining contracts before implementation accelerates development, reduces integration bugs, and enables parallel workflows across teams.
